YES ADD THIS

Find his soul mate.. He has traveled the stars, and crashed on a planet.. He didnt know this is what he was looking for.. He wasnt looking for anything really obviously he crashed lol.. Little did he know there is a single female penguin on this planet, she has been lost for

She said: I love you

To which he looks at her an says: I know
Hahahaha!!! YESS

He is quicker than any penguins, He is the leader of the north penguin army. They fight against the polar bears for stealing their most and only favorite food: FISHES! The mega penguin WILL NEVER SURRENDER! ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam
And they're having a party once the Polar Bear army was beaten by them! ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam

Players are allowed to play as The Mega Penguin with his lazer eyes and his running ability, while other penguins are helping him to stop these pesky polar bears from taking their fishes! All Penguins and Polar Bears were also driving tanks and airplanes in this insane war!
Mega Penguin must find and assemble the pieces of a scroll that reveals the Dreams release date! , ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam
(now with hashtags included!)

He then sees explore the Icy Tundra and while exploring, he sees a Mafia group of a Strong Seal, a robotic Killer whale, and a Shark, capturing other penguins and trapping them in crates, and Mega Penguin must Stop the Mafia and saved his kind. ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam

Mega Penguin is able to stretch his arms over long distances in an instant. It is unknown how far he can stretch his arms. He can basically do a Dash attack, Double Jump and wall jump. ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam

The collectables are, Fish; gave you points, Crete; brake them and they release other penguins, Gold Crates; after braking these special Crates, they a Emperor Penguin or a King Penguin, they have there own personality. ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam
Mega Penguin stands silent sentinel outside the the northern ice village, motionless but for his slowly searching eyes.
The the.  Well, I was almost elegant.

Mega penguin has to balance her mega-egg on her feet to keep the giant egg off of the ice until the other mega penguin gets back. If you win the egg hatches to reveal one random number. Win six times in increasingly impossible circumstances to get release date.

#,DreamsPS4,  ,#,E3Jam, Mega Penguins' eggs land on Earth but only one hatches, the player's job is to feed Mega Penguin by guiding him to tiny cities he must destroy. Once he eats enough, MP can hatch a new egg making an army, game ends with no eggs left and Penguins ruling the Earth
Gives regular penguins he touches with the power of flight. ,#,DreamsPS4, ,#,E3Jam

#,DREAMSPS4, ,#,E3Jam, Penguin has to restore harmony to the oceans of earth placing cleanup machines by swimming to locations while avoiding sharks and other hazards. Also must collect fresh ice and return it to power eggship on to the next world in need of help before time runs out
